title: feTile
shortDescriptionOfTheTag: The feTile tag defines an image to be used as a texture map that can be tiled, stretched, or repeated, and can be used within the <filter> element to apply image processing operations such as blurring or color adjustments.

usageExamples.title: Example
usageExamples.description: Using feTile to create a tiled texture for an SVG shape:
usageExamples.code:
<filter id="tileFilter">
  <feTile result="tiledImage" />
</filter>

<rect x="10" y="10" width="100" height="100" fill="url(#tileFilter)" />
